# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

### Added

- Documentation site with MkDocs
- API reference with mkdocstrings
- User guide and how-to guides

## [0.0.1] - 2024-01-XX

### Added

- Initial release
- `DuckDB` class for SQL queries with S3 integration
- `S3FileSystem` class for parquet read/write operations
- `Spreadsheet` and `Worksheet` classes for Google Sheets operations
- Local preview mode for Google Sheets (no credentials required)
- `load_json_config` function with JSONC comment support
- `setup_logging` function for logging configuration
- Comprehensive test suite with 100% coverage
